title: Living not dying
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Breast - Cancer
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Cancer - Psychological aspects
abstract: A woman lives with advanced breast cancer.
description: A personal account created by a participant in the ACMI Digital Storytelling Workshop "Journeys with Breast Cancer" Created in association with Breast Cancer Network Australia. "For the past six years, I have been living with, not dying from, advanced breast cancer. My original diagnosis was in 1996, when I was 40 years old."
